title: when creating a new folder the cursor is set at the first folder and itâ´s not possible to do nothing but refresh
body:
### expected behaviour
when you create a new folder you could move to another folder or file

### actual behaviour
when you create a new folder, itâ´s not possible to keep working with the server unless you refresh

### steps to reproduce
1. log in the enterprise version 
2. create a new folder
3. the cursor is set automatically in the first folder and you couldn't move it. if you want to server to work again you have to refresh (attached a screenshot)


### server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.12","versionstring":"5.0.7 enterprise rc1","edition":"enterprise"}
sql lite

### client configuration
browser: ie9

operating system:mac 10.8.3

### logs
#### web server error log
```
debug	 core	 include path for class "oca_firstrunwizard\config" starts with "apps/"	 june 26, 2013 10:51
debug	 core	 adding user backend instance of oc_user_database.	 june 26, 2013 10:51

```
![screen shot 2013-06-26 at 10 50 44](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/4689430/708186/062a8846-de3e-11e2-8c28-58a1931dba0d.png)
